conclusion: Analyze forces acting on the ball to determine its trajectory.
Ball is falling freely from above, initially positioned above the blocks.
Gravity pulls the ball downward, air resistance is negligible.
Ball will fall straight down until it collides with the first block.
Calculate time of fall using formula t = sqrt(2h/g), with h = 0.
Ball will land on the surface of the blocks after colliding with the first block.
Ball will land on the surface of the blocks.
